title: Critérium du Dauphiné Stage 2: Magnus Cort Outmuscles Roglič, Jorgenson in Uphill Sprint
content:
Cort takes yellow jersey after overnight race-leader Mads Pedersen loses time in climbing finale of Monday's stage.

Read the full article at Critérium du Dauphiné Stage 2: Magnus Cort Outmuscles Roglič, Jorgenson in Uphill Sprint on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
